The "out-of-the-box" version of Perseus already provides much functionality, but it can easily be extended further with plugins. Standard [activities](docs/perseus_activities.html) are implemented in the same way as plugins.

# Plugin Store

To browse a list of available plugins, visit our [Perseus Plugin Store](docs/perseuspluginstore.html) [[perseus:user:plugins:store|]].

# Developer's Guide

The developers guide is available on [plugintutorial on github](http://github.com/jdrudolph/plugintutorial).
